name: vsf-integration-docs
description: Documentation for prestashop integration for Vue Storefront

scripts.build: yarn docs:extract && yarn docs:generate && vuepress build
scripts.docs:extract: cd ../packages/api-client && api-extractor run --local && cd ../composables && api-extractor run --local
scripts.docs:generate: api-documenter markdown --i api-client --o api-client && api-documenter markdown --i composables --o composables
